SEARCH
Package ulb.infof307.g04.view

Class HomeViewController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g04.view.AbstractViewController
ulb.infof307.g04.view.HomeViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable, IViewController
public class HomeViewController extends AbstractViewController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Parent view controller for the Home view (declared in home.fxml) The Home view contains elements that don't change throughout the Scene (e.g. the nav bar). It features "sub-views" that add visuals to the FXML file and instantiates related sub-controllers, based on where the User is in the program.
See Also:

  • SettingsController
